video_description: http://www.droid-life.com - A walk-through of a few Android games on the Motorola XOOM.  Check out the power of the Tegra 2!  Full review at the site.
title: Motorola XOOM Gaming Review

comments.text: You talk like Tegra 2 is never going to lag. Be a little more realistic. It's a﻿ computer. All computers lag. I don't care if you put an i7 quad core at 4.0Ghz, it's eventually going to lag. Software updates and usage of the device will cause that. Try all this again after you've had the tablet for 4-5 months and have it filled with stuff. My G2 never lagged when it was 1 week old, but after 6 months, it has a little bit harder time with the same apps.
